attributes.action: Get eveyone around schools in uk to wear pink on May 22 2018
attributes.additional_details: It would be amazing if schools would let pupils wear pink to show support and love.
attributes.background: On May 22nd 2017 there was a bombing at a Ariana Grande concert killing 22 and seen as this may 22 it’ll be a year since the attack we should all show our support and schools around the uk should be allowed to wear something pink in memory in the 22 that died.

rejection.details:
This petition seems to be calling on schools and students to act, not the UK Government or Parliament. 

You may wish to sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/213982
